frontmatter.title: Is referral, affiliate and influencer marketing the same thing?
frontmatter.meta_title: Referral, affiliate and influencer marketing refers to the same thing

markdownRemark.html:
Yep, that's right.

Referral/affiliate/influencer marketing bascially mean the same thing. There are subtle differences, but they are trivial in practice. So feel free to use whichever term suits your brand the best!
